column1: What is the sum of the first 100 natural numbers?
Two trains 100 miles apart are traveling toward each other on the same track. Train A is moving at 40 kph and Train B is moving at 60 kph. How many hours does it take for the two trains to collide?
If you can climb stairs either 1 step or 2 steps at a time how many different ways can you climb a staircase with 6 steps?
A father is four times as old as his son. In 20 years the father will be twice as old as his son. How old is the father now?

If you place one grain of rice on the first square of a chessboard and then double the amount on each subsequent square (2 grains on the second 4 on the third and so on) how many grains of rice will be on the 64th square?
